name: unFortunate Soldier
description:
A soldier is traped with an undead army and after each wave defeated he has a difficult choice to do...

After each wave he can improve one of his attributes, but the not selected ones will be downgraded...

  • Damage
  • Attack Speed
  • Bullet Speed
  • Armor
  • Movement Speed

The are 3 enemy types...

  • Skeleton Guard
  • Skeleton Warrior
  • Undead Ninja

How to play

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS - MOVE THE SOLDIER
  • MOUSE - AIM!
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOT!

Credits

  • Free Game Music Pack
  • Ultimate Sound FX Bundle

This game was made by johnperes for:

  • Blackthornprod Game Jam #3

Thanks for playing!

Please post your records screenshots!
